channel.title: CVE Feed for Aminur Islam -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Aminur Islam -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31927|2024-08-02T01:59:50.561Z -- aminur%20islam -- wp%20login%20and%20logout%20redirect
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Aminur Islam WP Login and Logout Redirect allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Login and Logout Redirect: from n/a through 1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-29815|2024-03-27T12:00:39.972Z -- aminur%20islam -- wp%20change%20email%20sender
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Aminur Islam WP Change Email Sender allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Change Email Sender: from n/a before 1.3.0.
